# utils.numeric_to_alpha { #operetta_compose.utils.numeric_to_alpha }

`utils.numeric_to_alpha(numeric, upper=True)`

Return the upper or lowercase character for a given position in the alphabet

## Parameters

| Name      | Type   | Description                      | Default    |
|-----------|--------|----------------------------------|------------|
| `numeric` | int    | Integer position in the alphabet | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type   | Description               |
|--------|---------------------------|
| str    | Single alphabet character |
